steps.description: Place-Place 8-inch flour tortilla on cutting board

errors.description: placed 8 inch flour tortilla on plate instead of cutting board.

steps.description: scoop-Use the knife to scoop jelly from the jar
steps.modified_description: scoop-Use the knife to scoop jelly from the jar with improper technique. improper as vertical scooping of knife and no. of times reduced

errors.description: techique error while scooping through jelly as the knife was not slanted and just put vertically. Also did the two times whereas should have been done 3 times.

steps.description: Spread-Spread jelly over the nut butter
steps.modified_description: Spread-Spread jelly over the tortilla with improper technique. Jelly on boundary and not middle, overflow from boundary

errors.description: Jelly is spread on tortilla improperly. Jelly is spread on boundary and not in the middle portion. jelly is overflowed from the tortilla.

steps.description: scoop-Use a butter knife to scoop nut butter from the jar
steps.modified_description: scoop-Use a butter knife to scoop nut butter from the jar. Improper preparation as spoon is used instead of knife.

errors.description: use spoon to scoop nut butter from the jar. knife should have been used.

steps.description: Spread-Spread nut butter onto the tortilla, leaving 1/2-inch uncovered at the edges
steps.modified_description: Spread-Spread nut butter onto the tortilla. leaving 2-inch uncovered at the edges.

errors.description: Spread nut butter onto the tortilla. leaving 2-inch uncovered at the edges.

steps.description: Clean-Clean the knife by wiping it with a paper towel
steps.modified_description: Clean-Clean the knife by wiping it with a paper towel. Improper technique (down side of knife not cleaned)

errors.description: Improper Cleaning of the knife with paper towel. paper towel did not cover down side of the knife.

steps.description: Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to the other into a log shape, about 1.5 inches thick. Roll it tight enough to prevent gaps, but not so tight that the filling leaks
steps.modified_description: Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to the other into a log shape, about 2.5 inches thick. Roll it loosely with huge gaps. filling does not leak. improper measurement.

errors.description: Roll the tortilla from one end to the other into a log shape, about 2.5 inches thick. Roll it loosely with huge gaps. filling does not leak.

steps.description: Secure-Secure the rolled tortilla by inserting 5 toothpicks about 1 inch apart
steps.modified_description: Secure-Secure the rolled tortilla by inserting 3 toothpicks about 2 inch apart, improper measurement

errors.description: used 3 toothpicks only instead of 5. placed them 2 inch apart instead of 1 inch apart.

steps.description: Clean-Clean the knife by wiping with a paper towel
Slide-Slide floss under the tortilla, perpendicular to the length of the roll
steps.modified_description: Slide-Slide floss under the tortilla, parallel to the length of the roll

errors.description: Slide floss under the tortilla, parallel to the length of the roll. Did parallel instead of perpendicular.

steps.description: Place-Place the floss halfway between toothpicks
Cross-Cross the floss's two ends over the tortilla roll's top
pull-pull the floss ends in opposite directions to slice
Trim-Trim the ends of the tortilla roll with the butter knife, leaving 1/2 inch margin between the last toothpick and the end of the roll
steps.modified_description: Trim-Trim the ends of the tortilla roll with the spoon base, leaving 1/2 inch margin between the last toothpick and the end of the roll

errors.description: used spoon base instead of butter knife to trim the ends of tortilla roll. Left 1/2 inch margin between last toothpick and end of the roll.

steps.description: Place-Place the pinwheels on a plate
steps.modified_description: Place-Place the pinwheels on a plate

errors.description: slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
